channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260106.1)
item.description:
What's New

feat: add open dictionary folder button and debug logging

  • Add button to open dictionary folder next to "Reload" button in settings
  • Add getDictionaryDirectoryURL() method to VNDictionaryManager
  • Add comprehensive debug logging for dictionary download/load process
  • Check HTTP status code and empty data during download
  • Helps diagnose "file doesn't exist" errors during dictionary operations

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
